effect.Name: Stamp
effect.description: Stamp - The base color is multiplied by 2 and multiplied by blend then subtracted from the total of 1
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Stamp (Background) Shader | 1.0 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: The base color is multiplied by 2 and multiplied by blend then subtracted from the total of 1

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
